pages.text: Sand dollars can also be called sand cakes or cake urchins.
Seagrasses are the only flowering plants which grow in marine environments.
Seaferns have a self-supporting growth form and simple, broad leaves.
Kelp may develop dense forests with high production, biodiversity and ecological function.
Sea anemones are typically predators, ensnaring prey of suitable size that comes within reach of their tentacles.
Sea anemones are found in both deep oceans and shallow coastal waters worldwide.
The greatest diversity is in the tropics, although there are many species adapted to relatively cold waters.
Sea anemones and their attendant anemone fish can make attractive aquarium exhibits, and both are often harvested from the wild as adults or juveniles.
The whole animal is marinated in vinegar, then coated in a batter similar to that used to make calamari, and deep-fried in olive oil.
They can be found in association with hydrothermal vents, methane seeps, sunken plant material, and whale carcasses.
